html:
Project information renovation Amstel Hotel Health & Fitness Club:

Architect: Kamerlingvanderburgh Interieur + Architectuur, Oegstgeest
Architectural contractor: Painting Bouw, Zaandam
Installation: Twiske Installatie, Amsterdam
Floor tiling: Keijsper-Reus, Alkmaar
Mosaic tiling: Gerard Westland & Zoon, Huizen
Swimming pool technique: Hellebrekers, Nunspeet
Showers and fittings: Dornbracht
Mosaic: Sicis
Stone: Boot Natuursteen, Lisse; Kol Tegels, Haarlem
Lighting: Modular
Furniture: Roda
Photos: Matthijs van Roon
